analysis.key_quote: I object to expanding Schedule F employees.  In spite of rumors to the contrary, Civil Service employees simply uphold the law and complete the project.  They are NOT Political, but this would make them political.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the expansion of Schedule F, emphasizing that civil service employees are not political and expressing concern that the proposed rule would politicize them, which aligns with the theme of politicization concerns.
